name: Clubhouse product analysis wireframes
description:
Check out these product analysis wireframes I've designed in the process of understanding the secret sauce behind the exponential growth of the Clubhouse platform. While they've introduced us to the new voice-based social media platform, meanwhile they've also focused on keeping the platform as simple as possible and leveraging behavior patterns already established by other most used applications.


So what exactly do you think the secret sauce of Clubhouse that allows them to have such exponential growth?
